posts.post_content: I would have preferred it was 5/6, but I actually like this card.. I have a thing for cool cat monsters, its in white, which is unusual for a beast. Sort of an excellent blocker card that can still attack, and hey, you know this card was made for Celestial mantle. The name means cat as in felids or feline, and sovereign, so sort of an emperor cat or cat with its own authority, hence the win by 40 or more life points. Everyone just needs to take a step back, ignore the mythic rare symbol for a minute, and say.. ah.. a nice 6 toughness blocker with vigilance and lifelink in white, and there you have it.
posts.html:
I would have preferred it was 5/6, but I actually like this card.. I have a thing for cool cat monsters, its in white, which is unusual for a beast. Sort of an excellent blocker card that can still attack, and hey, you know this card was made for Celestial mantle. The name means cat as in felids or feline, and sovereign, so sort of an emperor cat or cat with its own authority, hence the win by 40 or more life points. Posted By: Arachibutyrophobia (9/27/2009 1:31:51 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I don't see a problem with this being mythic. It has a "you win the game" ability, and those don't come around every day. If you want to complain about a mythic, complain about [Lotus Cobra](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lotus Cobra). Repeat after me, Wizards: A 2-mana 2/1 with a technically great but non-flashy ability IS NOT MYTHIC. That is why you make RARES. Remember?  
  
EDIT: Yes, Andleck, since your opponent has [Platinum Angel](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Platinum Angel) out, you won't be able to win with the Sovereign's ability. If two cards conradict each other, the negative one wins out. (If one card says creatures with Defender can attack as though they didn't have Defender and another says creatures can't attack, the "can't" effect is applied.)
posts.html:
I don't see a problem with this being mythic. It has a "you win the game" ability, and those don't come around every day. If you want to complain about a mythic, complain about Lotus Cobra. EDIT: Yes, Andleck, since your opponent has Platinum Angel out, you won't be able to win with the Sovereign's ability. If two cards conradict each other, the negative one wins out. (If one card says creatures with Defender can attack as though they didn't have Defender and another says creatures can't attack, the "can't" effect is applied.)

posts.post_content:
I love it. Does it deserve to be a mythic rare? Not in 10000 years. Unless there is some serious life gain going on in the next sets in the block, mythic rare status has been rendered meaningless already.  
  
[Celestial Mantle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Celestial Mantle) is good.  
  
I'm already building a deck around this thing. With a few [moment's peace](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=moment's peace)s and [wall of reverence](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=wall of reverence)s, getting to 40 life shouldn't be a problem.
